snippet: A Bahraini teenager was shot and killed during clashes with the kingdom's security forces on Thursday, as protesters marked the second anniversary of the protest movement.
abstract: A Bahraini teenager was shot and killed during clashes with the kingdom's security forces on Thursday, as protesters marked the second anniversary of the protest movement.

byline.original: By CHRISTINE HAUSER and ROBERT MACKEY

headline.main: Teenager Killed in Bahrain on Protest Anniversary
